body.instruction: Identify the noun-adjective pairing in these sentences, along with their CNG. Then select each card to check your answer.
body.instruction_textversion: Identify the noun-adjective pairing in these sentences, along with their CNG. Check your answer by selecting Back of Card.

front.content: He will point the way with a large sign.
